com.tablecomponent.daos

Class SummaryTableDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tablecomponent.daos.SummaryTableDAO

  • public class SummaryTableDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access Object class for Summary table. It is able to perform query execution
    Author:
    Petr

    • Method Detail

      • executeQuery

        public void executeQuery(java.lang.String country,
                java.lang.String quartal,
                QuartalShareDAO quartalShareDAO)
        Perform execution of query to select all vendors, units and share for selected state and quartal.
        Parameters:
        country - state where you are interested in
        quartal - quartal which you are interested in

      • executeQuery

        public java.lang.String[] executeQuery(java.lang.String country,
                              java.lang.String quartal,
                              java.lang.String vendor,
                              QuartalShareDAO quartalShareDAO)
        Perform execution of query to select given vendor's share of units in percentage for specified quartal and country
        Parameters:
        country - given country where vendor sold units
        quartal - given quartal where vendor sold units
        vendor - given vendor which we interested in
        Returns:
        array with two items where first is amount of sold units and second is vendor's share

      • getRowNumber

        public java.lang.String getRowNumber(java.lang.String vendor)
        Return number of row which contains information about given vendor. If the table is empty then method returns non existent vendor.
        Parameters:
        vendor - Given vendor which we are interested in
        Returns:
        String value with number of row that contains vendor's informations

      • sortTableBy

        public void sortTableBy(ColumnType type)
        Sort existing table by given Column type.
        Parameters:
        type - Column type e.g. VENDOR, UNITS
